奶鞋底.en: to suck up to the wrong person; an attempt to suck up to someone which failed miserably [colloquial]

媾仔.en: to go out looking for men to chat up; to flirt with guys [colloquial]

屌你老尾冚家剷.en: euphemism for 'fuck your mother you bastard', foul language insulting one's mother when cursing someone [colloquial]
